page.title: 19THE VILLAGE POLICEMAN
page.content: {PC Wynes}is Sarratt's policeman. He and his family live in the police house close to the green.As well as looking after Sarratt he has responsibility for Belsize, Bucks Hill, Commonwood, Chandlers Cross and part of Langleybury. In this area there are two and a half thousand adults and two hundred and fifty children. PC Wynes' job is to keep things in order and to get to know everyone. PC Wynes gets about by riding a bike although he sometimes walks. The biggest problems are caused by farmers arguing about poaching and trespassers. If anything gets out of hand PC Wynes calls the Police Station at Rickmansworth and asks for immediate back up. Watford Central Police Station is where all of the orders come from.
